e4: Adopting a new unbiased policy is essential for building long-term trust with investors,  facilitating genuine valuation, and meeting SEC compliance requirements. e5: An ethical reporting policy prioritizes full transparency, including both accurate representation of company performance and realistic forecasts. It minimizes hidden biases, avoids misleading projections, and adheres to relevant legal and accounting standards.  It acknowledges potential market realities and communicates honestly, even when presenting challenging outcomes.
